thesis: From the impossibility of self‑referential non‑existence, a unique, discrete, dual‑balanced, self‑similar ledger with cost J and golden scaling φ forces d=3, an 8‑tick recognition cycle, a minimal operational code (LNAL), and parameter‑free predictions; the total object is a measurement, not a tunable model.

ilg.status: draft with combinatorial schedule; uniqueness proof in progress

confidence_criteria: Cubic tiling either proven or made explicitly conditional
Unique ILG kernel reused across domains
Parameter‑free mass pipeline with rung uniqueness and shared gap series
next_actions: Finalize nine gate (Mj, Kj, Φj) predicates and verify |B|=46 analytically
Complete ILG uniqueness proof and apply kernel to growth/lensing examples
Formalize LNAL generator–relation proof; ±5 exclusion inequality
Promote α constants to combinatorial/Regge lemmas or box as conjecture
